This is â€œKimi wo Nosete (English Version)â€
reimagined and reconstructed into an epic, emotional hardcore sound.
While preserving the gentle nostalgia of the original,
this Hardcore Cover blends fast aggressive drums, heavy guitars,
and cinematic synths to create a powerful, high-energy arrangement.
Experience the speed, the intensity, and the emotional lift â€”
best enjoyed with headphones.
If you enjoyed this version, please like, comment, and subscribe!

- Lyric -
The whole horizon spreading wide
Whisper what this feels like sky
Why it shines so beautifully
Because behind it there you hide

All the yearning that I feel
For the many lights I see
Is all because the warmth that they give
Reminds me so much of you

Let the journey start from here
With a slice of bread to make
Everything that you need in your bag
All you need to take

My father left for me
This flaming soul I feel
My mother gave to me
This heart with truth I seek

As the words will make its mark
It will hide your heart in mine
For the twinkling it's on

As the words will make its mark
It will take your all these wings

On its wings you and I
